song.englishname: All The Glory/ He Shall Reign

english.segment1: My heart is full of admiration. For You, my Lord, my God and King. Your excellence my inspiration. Your words of grace have made my spirit sing
english.segment2: All the glory, honour and power. Belong to you, belong to you. Jesus, Saviour, Anointed One. I worship You, I worship You
english.segment3: You love what's right and hate what's evil. Therefore your God sets you on high. And on your head pours oil of gladness. While fragrance fills your royal palaces
english.segment4: Your throne, O God, will last forever. Justice will be your royal decree. In majesty, ride out victorious. For righteousness, truth and humility
english.segment5: Graham Kendrick. Copyright Â© 1991 Make Way Music
